title: Keep/Trade/Cut + Player Upside, Snowcone Break - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/3
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, tough fantasy draft decisions to make! Is Deebo Samuel a smash pick in the 2nd round with his new contract? Draft CeeDee Lamb for the upside for reliable veteran Mike Evans? Plus, the latest reports out of Training Camp, and a handful of listener questions answered! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 3rd, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW
